    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • getSource

        TorrentSource getSource()
        Since:
        1.3

      • getAnnounceKey

        Optional<AnnounceKey> getAnnounceKey()
        Returns:
        Announce key, or Optional.empty() for trackerless torrents
        Since:
        1.1

      • getTorrentId

        TorrentId getTorrentId()
        Returns:
        Torrent ID.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns:
        Suggested name for this torrent.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getChunkSize

        long getChunkSize()
        Returns:
        Size of a chunk, in bytes.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getChunkHashes

        Iterable<byte[]> getChunkHashes()
        Returns:
        Sequence of SHA-1 hashes of all chunks in this torrent.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getSize

        long getSize()
        Returns:
        Total size of all chunks in this torrent, in bytes.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getFiles

        List<TorrentFile> getFiles()
        Returns:
        Information on the files contained in this torrent.
        Since:
        1.0

      • isPrivate

        boolean isPrivate()
        Returns:
        True if this torrent is private (see BEP-27)
        Since:
        1.0

      • getCreationDate

        Optional<Instant> getCreationDate()
        Returns:
        Creation time of the torrent
        Since:
        1.5

      • getCreatedBy

        Optional<String> getCreatedBy()
        Returns:
        Creator of the torrent (usually name and version of the program used to create the .torrent file)
        Since:
        1.5
